tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NNS Credits)) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN beginning)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT a) (NN movie)))))) (VP (VBP are) (ADJP (RB really) (JJ annoying))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [annoying/JJ nsubj>[Credits/NNS nmod:at>[beginning/NN case>at/IN det>the/DT nmod:of>[movie/NN case>of/IN det>a/DT]]] cop>are/VBP advmod>really/RB punct>!/.]
